text: (aapako adhikaar hai ki) jise aap chaahen, alag rakhen apanee patniyon mein se aur apane saath rakhen, jise chaahen aur jise aap chaahen, bula len unamen se, jinhen alag kiya hai. aapapar koee dosh nahin hai. is prakaar, adhik aasha hai ki unakee aankhen sheetal hon aur ve udaaseen na hon tatha prasann rahen usase, jo aap unasab ko den aur allaah jaanata hai jo tumhaare dilon[1] mein hai aur allaah ati gyaanee, sahanasheel[2] hai
